name: Chital Dining Table with Polished Stainless Steel
description: The Chital Dining table is a stunning piece, a statement in any space. The black pen shell or antique natural shagreen inlaid top is sleek and dramatic, and followed by a new chrome finish polished stainless steel sculptural legs clustered together as the base. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria & Yiouri Augousti. Available in other finishes and as a round breakfast table version.
